alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Warren (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 09 at 10:20AM EST until further notice by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Baltimore MD/Washington DC has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in West Virginia... Virginia... Shenandoah River at Millville affecting Warren, Clarke and Jefferson Counties. ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Shenandoah River at Millville. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Parts of Bloomery Road and John Rissler Road are flooded near Bloomery, West Virginia. Once these roads flood, access to homes is impaired but the homes themselves are not in any danger of flooding. Moulton Park and the Millville boat launch are also flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Tuesday the stage was 2.7 feet, or 7.3 feet below flood stage. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached based on the latest forecast information. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Please visit www.weather.gov/safety/flood for flood safety and preparedness information && River Name Fld Observed Tue Wed Wed Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time 7PM 1AM 7AM Stg Time Date Shenandoah River Millville 10.0 2.7 Tue 9 am 3.5 4.5 5.5 9.6 1am Thu &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/washington or www.weather.gov/baltimore. The next statement will be issued this evening at 630 PM EST.
